TopicTitle: The Number War: Count to 100 or -100

Articles.Content: Ok, number is 45 now.

And now it is 46.

- - - Updated - - -

My post is correct because of 7 again, right?

this is way too confusing.

47.
48
47 lets make this less confusing by going down a bit

I find it intriguing, especially if it happens by coincidence and not tactics. But please do not edit your posts after posting.

46

No, lets go up. 49

Deu, what's the number?
dang. just dang. this is so confusing.
Did anyone else see 5 posts in the "XX:52" timestamp?

Deu, what's the number?

Glad you asked, Dman.

The sequence goes as follows:

noname117: 47 (valid)

Endersman: 48 (invalid, overridden)

Deutherius: 46 (overriding Endersman)

Dman: 49 (invalid, continuing from overridden number)

The number is therefore 46, set by me.

Back to you, Dman.
This is Dman979, live from my computer. THIS JUST IN! The number is now 48! Previous claims have been confirmed. Back to you, Deu.

Did anyone else see 5 posts in the "XX:52" timestamp?

I only see 3 posts with the X:52 timestamp. Endersman, me and you.

Also, 46
And the number is now 47!

Ladies and gentlemen, we have live footage straight from the action! It's an F-5 tornado, numbers are flying everywhere, EVERYWHERE! RIGHT NOW, 46 HAS JUST FLOWN BY, NEARLY MISSING OUR CAMERA!

And now with sports: our very own Dman979.

Thank you, Deu.

It's a very exiting game folks its neckandneck here between the Reds and Blues and OH MY GOD! A BREAK THROUGH THE MIDDLE! JEB CUTS! HE SHOOTS! HE SCORES!!!! And it's all over but the crying now. A 47- 46 game, very close, but Jeb pulled it through.

Let's head over to the launchpad for our postgame analysis with Deu.

Thank you Dman. Well, if we look at team Blue's strategy, we can see they chose the classic "Double Turboramjet" approach - that is, go by the sides at full throttle until everything overheats and explodes. The Reds, however, took it a few kilometers higher and got the whole thing going really fast, so fast that Blue's had no chance of catching up - this allowed them to score the final point in the wonderful 47 : 46 game. And what a game it was!

And now, we should have a live coverage of the next SpaceX launch abort test, with Dman at the microphone. How do you hear me, Dman?
Going down again to 45

Sorry, ladies and gentlemen, there seems to be heavy interference, we cannot reach Dman at the moment. Signal strength is currently at 44 dB and going down. Excuse the technical difficulties, we should be right back.

Well, there was a bit of interference, Deu, but it's cleared up now.

I'm standing here next to the flame trench, and boy, this is a beut. She stands about 46 meters tall, and we're launching in 46 seconds.

She'll head up for about 46 seconds and break through Max-Q at roughly 46,000 meters. The capsule will fire the LES for 4.6 seconds and jetison its shroud at 46 seconds after the firing. The chutes will deploy at 4.6 miles up, and slow the descent to ~46 meters/second by 4,600 feet up. The breaking motors will fire for 46 seconds, and the capsule will touch down at 4.6 meters/ second at approximately 4.6 minutes after launch.

- - - Updated - - -

Wow: the timing was impeccable.
Time out is it 44 or 46?
